project.name: Personal landing page
project.role: At the middle of May 2017 I’ve started developing on my own personal landing page with my portfolio and details description of my experience.
project.purpose: The purpose of the project: investigation new pretty technologies and developing my own landing page with examples of my works.

responsibilities: Organization of dev environment: setting up framework, builder.
Creating a routing system for new components.
Creating templates based on mockups own designed.

project.name: Freelance
project.role: In this project, I was developing a client side of the application. I worked in big, international and distributed team, which has more than 20 developers, the total number of developers in the project is about 150. I was creating new controllers to supporting new features of the application, as well I’ve creating services for interaction with the distributed requests system.
project.customer: International company with stakeholder and developers from America, China and India.
project.purpose: The purpose of the project: development of product for the accounting of human resources.

responsibilities: Organization of dev environment: setting up framework, builder.
Creating a routing system for new and current controllers.
Creating templates based on mockups which designers gave me.
Creating and describing of application controllers logic.
Interaction with the distributed request system on backend side.

project.name: ParaShoes
project.role: On my first project I worked on developing the client part of the Internet showcase. At the beginning of the project there was no designer and I developed mockups, so it's not alien to me. As a result, there were two developers - I was responsible for Front End and one Back End developer with whom I collaborated in terms of integration.
project.customer: Ukrainian product company ParaShoes - shoes selling company.
project.purpose: The purpose of the project: development of an Internet showcase of the company.

responsibilities: Organization of dev environment: setting up framework, builder.
Creating a routing system for future application.
Creating and describing of application controllers logic.
Integration with backend of the application.
